auto.#desc: Mark the given packages as automatically installed

manual.#desc: Mark the given packages as manually installed

showauto.#desc: Print the list of automatically installed packages

showmanual.#desc: Print the list of manually installed packages

hold.#desc: Mark a package as held back

unhold.#desc: Unset a package set as held back

showhold.#desc: Print the list of packages on hold

minimize-manual.#desc: Mark all dependencies of meta packages as automatically installed.
